member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.IDataProtectionProvider
member.summary: An interface that can be used to create instances.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.IDataProtectionProvider.CreateProtector(System.String)
member.summary: Creates an given a purpose.
member.param: The purpose to be assigned to the newly-created .
member.returns: An IDataProtector tied to the provided purpose.
member.remarks: The parameter must be unique for the intended use case; two different instances created with two different values will not be able to decipher each other's payloads. The parameter value is not intended to be kept secret.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.IDataProtector
member.summary: An interface that can provide data protection services.

member.summary: Cryptographically protects a piece of plaintext data.
member.param: The plaintext data to protect.
member.returns: The protected form of the plaintext data.

member.name: M:Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.IDataProtector.Unprotect(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Cryptographically unprotects a piece of protected data.
member.param: The protected data to unprotect.
member.returns: The plaintext form of the protected data.
member.exception: Thrown if the protected data is invalid or malformed.

member.name: T:Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.Infrastructure.IApplicationDiscriminator
member.summary: Provides information used to discriminate applications.
member.remarks: This type supports the data protection system and is not intended to be used by consumers.

member.name: P:Microsoft.AspNetCore.DataProtection.Infrastructure.IApplicationDiscriminator.Discriminator
member.summary: An identifier that uniquely discriminates this application from all other applications on the machine.

member.name: T:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.WebEncoders
member.summary: Contains utility APIs to assist with common encoding and decoding operations.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.WebEncoders.Base64UrlDecode(System.String)
member.summary: Decodes a base64url-encoded string.
member.param: The base64url-encoded input to decode.
member.returns: The base64url-decoded form of the input.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws if the input is malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.WebEncoders.Base64UrlDecode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes a base64url-encoded substring of a given string.
member.param: A string containing the base64url-encoded input to decode.
The position in at which decoding should begin.
The number of characters in to decode.
member.returns: The base64url-decoded form of the input.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws if the input is malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.WebEncoders.Base64UrlDecode(System.String,System.Int32,System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Decodes a base64url-encoded into a byte[].
member.param: A string containing the base64url-encoded input to decode.
The position in at which decoding should begin.
Scratch buffer to hold the s to decode. Array must be large enough to hold and characters as well as Base64 padding characters. Content is not preserved.
The offset into at which to begin writing the s to decode.
The number of characters in to decode.
member.remarks: The input must not contain any whitespace or padding characters. Throws if the input is malformed.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.WebEncoders.GetArraySizeRequiredToDecode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Gets the minimum char[] size required for decoding of characters with the method.
member.param: The number of characters to decode.
member.returns: The minimum char[] size required for decoding of characters.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.WebEncoders.Base64UrlEncode(System.Byte[])
member.summary: Encodes using base64url encoding.
member.param: The binary input to encode.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.WebEncoders.Base64UrlEncode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes using base64url encoding.
member.param: The binary input to encode.
The offset into at which to begin encoding.
The number of bytes from to encode.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.WebEncoders.Base64UrlEncode(System.Byte[],System.Int32,System.Char[],System.Int32,System.Int32)
member.summary: Encodes using base64url encoding.
member.param: The binary input to encode.
The offset into at which to begin encoding.
Buffer to receive the base64url-encoded form of . Array must be large enough to hold characters and the full base64-encoded form of , including padding characters.
The offset into at which to begin writing the base64url-encoded form of .
The number of bytes from to encode.
member.returns: The number of characters written to , less any padding characters.

member.name: M:Microsoft.Extensions.Internal.WebEncoders.GetArraySizeRequiredToEncode(System.Int32)
member.summary: Get the minimum output char[] size required for encoding s with the method.
member.param: The number of characters to encode.
member.returns: The minimum output char[] size required for encoding s.
